questions.question_text: "expansion" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A process of increasing in size, number, or scope
The cancellation of a product line
questions.example_sentence: The company announced its expansion into three new international markets.
questions.explanation:
拡大・進出
製品ラインの中止
需要の一時減少
社内調査

questions.question_text: "emerging" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Growing and becoming more visible or important
No longer used in the market
Already dominant in the global economy
questions.example_sentence: The briefing highlighted opportunities in emerging Asian markets.
questions.explanation:
新興の・発展しつつある
市場から消えた
アクセス困難
世界で既に支配的

questions.question_text: "allocate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To distribute resources for a specific purpose
questions.example_sentence: Additional funds will be allocated to support market research abroad.
questions.explanation:
割り当てる・分配する
遅延させる
品質を下げる
顧客面接

questions.question_text: "barrier" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A difficulty or obstacle that prevents progress
questions.example_sentence: Language differences remain a major barrier to entering new regions.
questions.explanation:
障壁・妨げ
ビジネスパートナー
倉庫
研修

questions.question_text: "collaborate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To work together with others on a shared project
To compete aggressively for market share
questions.example_sentence: The company plans to collaborate with local distributors in new markets.
questions.explanation:
協力する・共同で行う
激しく競争する
競合企業を買収する
業績評価を行う
